Iron BarCode - The BarCode Library for .Net 

Supports applications and websites developed in 
- .Net FrameWork 4 (and above) for Windows and Azure
- .Net Standard / Core 2, 3 (and above) for Windows, Linux, MacOs and Azure


Please visit https://ironsoftware.com/csharp/barcode/ for:

- Code Samples,
- Support,
- MSDN object reference,
- Detailed Community Tutorials.
